Overview & Details

Apple MacBook Air® 13.3" 8GB RAM/128GB SSD Laptop
How's your Air speed? The ultra-slim, lightweight MacBook Air features a fast Intel Core i5 processor and 128GB flash storage drive for quick booting and file retrieval. Whether you stream movies, create documents or surf the web, everything will look better on the high-definition LED-backlit screen. Plus, Wi-Fi AC ensures you stay in the fast lane of the information superhighway too. When speed counts, reach for the MacBook Air!

What You Get
  • Apple MacBook Air 13.3" laptop 
  • AC adapter and cord 
  • Info pamphlet
  • Quick-start guide
  • 2 Decals
  • Manufacturer's 1-year limited warranty   

Good to Know
For warranty information, please call HSN.com Customer Service at 800.933.2887 (8 am-1 am ET).
  • For optimal performance, download and install available system updates upon first usage and regularly thereafter. The use of an anti-virus and anti-spyware program is recommended.
  • Actual user storage space available is typically less than stated due to preinstalled system software and programs.
  • Wired network connectivity requires a computer Ethernet port as well as an Ethernet cable connected to a router.
  • Wi-Fi-enabled computers require access to a wireless router. Wi-Fi speeds can vary depending on various factors, including the computer's distance from the router as well as their corresponding wireless protocols (e.g. "Wi-Fi b/g/n/ac").
  • Actual internet speeds may vary based on the bandwidth provided by your internet service provider and quality of the connection.
  • This item cannot be shipped to a P.O. Box. A physical address must be provided with your order. Signature required for delivery.
Shop all Apple

The Key Specs

Device Type: Laptop
Display Size: 13.3"
Display Type: HD LED-backlit LCD
Resolution: 1440 x 900
Processor: 1.8GHz Intel Core i5 dual-core
Memory: 8GB DDR3
Optical Drive: None
Storage: 128GB SSD
Operating System: macOS High Sierra

Additional Specs

Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
Audio: Stereo speakers; dual microphones
Wireless Adapter: Wi-Fi a/b/g/n/ac; Bluetooth 4.0
Wired Network Adapter: No
Keyboard: Backlit keyboard with multi-touch trackpad
Memory Card Slot: SDXC
Ports: (2) USB 3.0, (1) Thunderbolt 2, (1) 3.5mm headphone/microphone combo jack
Battery: Built-in rechargeable battery provides up to 12 hours of use on a full charge (depending on usage and settings)

The Basics

Color: Silver
Model #: MQD32LL/A
Measurements: Approx. 12.8"W x 0.68"H x 8.9" Deep
Weight: Approx. 2.96 lbs.
Power: Built-in 54 WHr lithium-polymer rechargeable battery charges via included 45-watt MagSafe 2 AC adapter
Country of Origin: China

Features

Intel Core i5 dual-core processor
  • Ultra-efficient architecture designed to use less power and still deliver high performance
  • Offers visibly smart, top-of-the-line performance for your most demanding tasks
  • See and feel the difference in HD, multitasking or multimedia applications
  • Delivers fast, smooth and rich computing and visual experiences for video and gaming

High-definition LCD with LED backlight
  • Supports high-definition resolution up to 1440 x 900 
  • Watch widescreen HD movies, play immersive games and view detailed photos
  • LED backlight helps conserve battery power

128GB flash-based storage
  • Delivers faster access to your data than traditional hard drives
  • Contributes to a much lighter and more portable design
  • No moving parts means quieter and cooler operation

Wi-Fi AC wireless networking
  • Enjoy fast, reliable wireless Internet when connected to your compatible router or public Wi-Fi hotspot
  • Wi-Fi AC offers speeds ideal for HD video streaming
  • Also works at Wi-Fi a/b/g/n speeds (connection speed varies depending on type of router used and environmental factors)

Built-in Bluetooth 4.0
  • Enables wireless connectivity to Bluetooth-compatible headphones, speakers and other devices

Thunderbolt 2 port
  • Provides data transfer speeds up to 20Gbps

Extended battery life
  • Enjoy up to 12 hours of on-the-go battery power (depending on usage and settings)
  • Up to 30 days standby time

More Features
  • Built-in 720p HD webcam
  • Intel HD Graphics 6000 for superior video and gaming performance
  • Stereo speakers
  • Full-size backlit keyboard
  • MagSafe 2 power port 
  • SDXC memory card slot

Software

Preloaded Software
  • Safari
  • Mail
  • Notes
  • Messages
  • Calendar
  • iPhoto
  • iTunes
  • FaceTime
  • Maps
  • iBooks
  • Pages
  • Numbers
  • Keynote
  • iMovie
  • GarageBand
  • App Store
  • Siri
  • Contacts
  • Reminders
  • Photo Booth
  • Preview
  • Time Machine

Overview & Details

HP Stream 14" HD Intel 4GB RAM, 32GB eMMC Windows 10 Laptop Bundle
Always on the go? So is the HP Stream. Its lightweight, thin design is easy to tote so you can enjoy a full Windows computer anywhere. This perfectly sized laptop delivers reliable performance and vivid visuals for your movies, photos and games. Plus, enjoy cloud storage that is always at your beck and call whenever you need to back up and access your valuable files. The HP Stream: your go-to digital companion wherever life leads you.

What You Get

Good to Know
For warranty information, please call HSN.com Customer Service at 800.933.2887 (8 am-1 am ET).
  • For optimal performance, download and install available system updates upon first usage and regularly thereafter. The use of an anti-virus and anti-spyware program is recommended.
  • Actual user storage space available is typically less than stated due to preinstalled system software and programs.
  • Wired network connectivity requires a computer Ethernet port as well as an Ethernet cable connected to a router.
  • Wi-Fi-enabled computers require access to a wireless router. Wi-Fi speeds can vary depending on various factors, including the computer's distance from the router as well as their corresponding wireless protocols (e.g. "Wi-Fi b/g/n/ac").
  • Actual internet speeds may vary based on the bandwidth provided by your internet service provider and quality of the connection.
  • This item cannot be shipped to a P.O. Box. A physical address must be provided with your order. Signature required for delivery.

HP 17" HD AMD A12 Quad-Core 12GB RAM, 1TB HDD Laptop w/Software & Tech
Whatever you’re passionate about — watching movies, playing games, connecting with the world — get ready to take it to the next level with this stylish and powerful PC. Its 17" screen provides a huge view of your favorite content. The upgraded 7th-generation processor fulfills your need for speed, while the fast-charging option gets you back to work or play pronto. With HP, you'll fall in love with portable computing all over again.
